name: Scene
description: Youth subculture popularized in the 2000s via MySpace, spanning Metalcore, Pop Punk, Post-Hardcore, and related genres; associated with androgynous hairstyles, mall-sourced fashion, the Warped Tour festival circuit, and varied crossover with Electronic music.

children.name: Happy Rock
children.description: Late 2000s Brazilian movement made as a response against Emo with a bright aesthetic, heavy use of electronic instruments and distorted vocals.
